attributes.action: Cut fuel Tax due to the rising oil prices to help motorists when filling up
attributes.additional_details: Cut fuel tax to bring down fuel prices at the pumps
attributes.background: Because of the current energy crisis and the war in Ukraine the price of this oil has give through the roof meaning motorists are paying substantially more at the pumps, we would fuel tax cut to mitigate this.

rejection.details:
We currently have the following petitions open on this topic:

Reduce fuel duty and VAT by 40% for a period of 2 years
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599089

Remove VAT from all domestic fuel, and provide price capping on heating oil.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/598647

Stop charging VAT on fuel duty
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599411

Hold an inquiry into fuel prices and introduce increased regulation
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/603624

Suspend the green levies on domestic fuel immediately.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/607977
